title: Hector's roadshow
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Saunders
brief_description: Humour and fantasy are employed to convey an essential road safety message to young children. Kerb drill, bicycle safety and the use of seat belts are emphasized in this zany pantomine. Cast: Tony Strachan and Greg Temple. Cinematographer/Director of Photography: Edwin Scragg.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australian Film Corporation and Ron Saunders
description: Humour and fantasy are employed to convey an essential road safety message to young children. Kerb drill, bicycle safety and the use of seat belts are emphasized in this zany pantomine. Cast: Tony Strachan and Greg Temple. Cinematographer/Director of Photography: Edwin Scragg.
description_for_label: Humour and fantasy are employed to convey an essential road safety message to young children. Kerb drill, bicycle safety and the use of seat belts are emphasized in this zany pantomine. Cast: Tony Strachan and Greg Temple. Cinematographer/Director of Photography: Edwin Scragg.
